p: Since many natural compounds are provided with anti- or pro-oxidant activity, we analyzed if the antitumor activity of the C. juttae oil was due to pro-oxidant activity. The cells were treated with the antioxidant N-acetyl-L-cysteine (NAC) at 2mM 1 h before exposure to the essential oil at the corresponding IC 50 values. In both cell lines the addition of NAC reduced cytotoxic activity, in particular the reduction was more evident in MDA-MB-231 cell line ( Table 2).
